nodes.text: Star Wars: The Clone Wars is a mobile strategy/action game based on the 2008 TV series of the same name.

Take command of a squads of clone troopers and hunt down the Separatist Army's new secret weapon. Exciting squad-based action in 15 original missions on 3 different planets. Interact with familiar heroes - Anakin Skywalker, Obi-Wan Kenobi, and Yoda and memorable villains Count Dooku and General Grievous.
